content: That sounds amazing! I'm definitely considering checking out Knott's Scary Farm this year. By the way, I've been thinking about my recent theme park adventures and realized that I've been lucky to experience some great events. Speaking of which, have you heard about the Wizarding World of Harry Potter's annual Celebration of Magic event at Universal Studios Hollywood? I attended it last month and was blown away by the Hogwarts castle lit up at night and the special effects show featuring fire, water, and light projections.
